website_summaries.verdict: Incorporate this gentle formula into your regular bath routine for easy and effective ear cleaning.
pros: Formula contains no harsh chemicals, making it ideal for routine cleanings
Gentle solution doesn’t irritate dogs, so you can wipe their ears clean without fussing
You’ll notice less ear scratching after just a few applications
Product has a fresh scent that lingers long after cleaning
cons: Oily formula will make dog fur greasy if you accidentally spill any

customer_reviews.title: Removes lots of wax!
customer_reviews.text: Hank has had issues with his ears for a long time. We had an extra powerful treatment done from the vet and they seemed to get better for the first time in months. Now when he starts to shake his head, I clean his ears with this and it goes away. He doesn't like to have his ears cleaned so sometimes he shakes his head as soon as I get it worked in to his ear canal. It's pretty amazing the wax that comes out when he does that! If I am able to clean it out myself, its clear how much wax it removes. Although I can't say Hank likes the cleanser, it certainly makes him feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Marsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for clearing up ear inflammation and infections
customer_reviews.text: Our Frenchie (and most of them) are notorious for having ear inflammation and infections. We must have spent 1K at the vet in a 5 month period getting him checked out and put on antibiotics and antifungals. There had to be another way. A colleague tipped me off about Zymox and how it did wonders for his English bulldog. So we tried it when he started having an ear infection. Few days of use and it cleared up right away. Now we wash his ears once a week with it. He's not "thrilled" about it, but he copes :P
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well. The instructions say to "flush ear canal liberally" so I did and although they cleaned the inside of her ear, it also got all over the outside which has left her fur slightly clumped and greasy. From now on maybe I'll use a bit less because now she looks like she's a greasy dirtball 😉 Even though she just recently had a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Rmason

customer_reviews.title: Zymox - A true believer!
customer_reviews.text: Our poor dog was miserable. She was constantly shaking her head and whining. She cried when you tried to clean them. We had tried everything the vet recommended. So glad I read all the reviews on this product. Amazing! The fluid and wax in her ears cleared up within 3 or 4 days. She hasn't had any problems since we used the Zymox products. We do clean every couple of weeks just to be careful, no more black goo!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Awesome: The Very Best
customer_reviews.text: This here product has done wonders for my Westie! I research products constantly online and on FB pet sites. Zymox is mentioned & recommended almost always. If not I post my praises of almost immediate relief-then cure. It’s great to save on vet bills! I think my senior even has regained some hearing. I purchased Zymox without hydrocortisone & have been using it on & off 4+yrs now. Save yourself the trouble of research- I’ve done it all lol
customer_reviews.author: LVgrl

customer_reviews.title: Truly Resolved Yeast & Bacterial Ear Infections
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best ear cleaner ever. I just purchased the third bottle & since starting to use this our elderly cocker spaniel has not had one ear infection. I clean her ears with it at least once a week & they’ve stayed in wonderful condition. Between having cockers & a Labrador, I’ve used every Rx prescription there is. Zymox is the best. Their ear treatments have resolved all yeast & bacterial infections for our dog.
customer_reviews.author: D.C. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Turned my puppy's ears red and inflamed
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in this ear cleanser. Unfortunately instead if cleaning my dogs ears it made them worse. They got red and inflamed after 2 uses. She then started shaking her head all the time. I stopped and switched to vinegar and water and it helped more then this. My dog ears were not horrible to begin with. She just has long droopy ears so i wanted to clean them before they were a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Noah L

customer_reviews.title: Our grand-daughter taught the rescued 2 yr old Black Lab ...
customer_reviews.text: Our grand-daughter taught the rescued 2 yr old Black Lab how to swim. He had never been in water and was scared to death. Now he's a swimming fool but not very elegant so we try to wash the ears with Zymox a few times each weak and there have been no problems. Our Labs have historically run up vet bills with ear problems and this heads off problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny S.

customer_reviews.title: Our Great Dane kept scratching his ears and the Vet diagnosed ...
customer_reviews.text: Our Great Dane kept scratching his ears and the Vet diagnosed him with a yeast infection. After taking the meds to cure him of his ailment, we purchased this product as preventative measures against the infection coming back. He doesn’t care much for it, and usually keeps shaking his head afterwards. This stuff is pretty sticky and as a result, we have switched up our routine with it. We apply it first thing while he’s getting a bath. That way his ears are cleaned and then all the excess is cleaned off during the bathing process and there is no stickiness! It works pretty well and his infection has not returned since.
customer_reviews.author: Dom&Mak

customer_reviews.title: life saver
customer_reviews.text: We have a one year old Great Pyrenees and his ears started to get a bit stinky. Put some of this stuff on a cotton ball and wiped the inside of his ears.. used a couple for each because they had a lot of build up. He looked at me with bewilderment ... He couldn't believe how much relief it gave him. He enjoys getting his ears cleaned... Obviously our babies can't talk to us, but I'm sure it's super uncomfortable having brown gunk built up in your ears! yucky. Buy this, you won't regret it... and you may be preventing a future ear infection by cleaning the ears before one begins.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Mastri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Standard Poodles
customer_reviews.text: We have had Standard Poodles with ear issues and then we have had those without. Several years ago a holistic vet recommended this product and we have been sold since. As much as I hate having to squirt a liquid in the boys' ears, I know this product will take care of the gunk or stop the beginning of an infection. There are other brands, but for the past 8 years, this is all we have used. Our vet sells this product for nearly the same price, but it's easier to get from Amazon if we are traveling and I can have delivered to where we are staying.
customer_reviews.author: Cielo Di Bend

customer_reviews.title: Great ear cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I have a couple of dogs who have floppy ears. Of course, we have to watch our fur babies with floppy ears that they don't get yeast in them. This stuff keeps them clean. I've had ear cleaners that literally hurt my dogs ears and made them cry but these are gentle and my dogs don't mind it. Keeps their ears clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm and my dog didn't mind me cleaning his ears out one bit! Instead of squirting it directly into his ear canal I soaked a cotton ball in zymox, put it in his ear canal and rubbed it around since he wouldn't let me squirt it directly in without fussing... he didn't mind this method one bit and the debris wiped away easily!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vet approved
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great for my Golden. Has had ear issues off and on for years as he loves the water and is rather hairy. Vet ear wash didn’t work as well. Squirt this on cotton balls and just insert in ear and massage and then pull out or let him sling it out. We use it after bath or swim. Hasn’t had stinky funky ear issue since. Vet approves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My pet doctor doesn't recommend it either.
customer_reviews.text: Have returned, at the same time have a 2 year old golden retriever and a 3 months old golden retriever of me, this one really bad to use, it will make the dog's ears more oil, is more terrible, drops in the dog's ear, because the product thickness and greasy feeling, the dog is very difficult to easily throw it to the ear, over time, causing contamination accumulation.My pet doctor doesn't recommend it either.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: My dog recently passed away... but during ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog recently passed away... but during his little life.... Zymox was a LIFE SAVER!!!! The vets won't tell you about it because they want to make money off you. I spent $1,700 at the vets trying to cure my little guys SEVERE ear infection. Nothing worked.... but this little $50 bottle of Zymox DID!!! Believe the reviews!!! This stuff works!!! And spread the word about it!!! Vets care about MONEY.... not your pets health....
customer_reviews.author: R.Mayall

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic results!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Labradoodle that has had yeast issues in his ears since he was a baby. We have spent thousands on vet treatments and meds. I just happened to be placing an ear cleaner order here on amazon and decided to look at suggested ear cleaners. When I saw all the testimony’s and reviews on the zymox products I thought it was worth a try. I purchased the ear cleaner and the Otic and we have had fantastic results so far. We are very pleased and think we may have finally knocked out this ear issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with controlling minor ear infections but messy
customer_reviews.text: My dog had an ear infection that was cured but a couple months later started showing signs of a new one. The ear cleanser is helping but I have one major complaint. It causes the fur around the ears to get dirty. The little bit of glycerin and glycol, necessary due to the enzymes, in it does not completely dry out so the ears get a little dirty with repeated uses.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very effective solution for dog ears' problems
customer_reviews.text: Very effective solution for dog ears' problems. Purchased before, it takes care of my dog's ear infections, cleans and gives temporary relief from itching and debris buildup. This time, however, the top knob was slightly open, allowing contents to leak inside package... Shouldn't be tight and sealed? or was it "previously owned" ... ?
customer_reviews.author: Mike Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My cat never had dirty ears until she started this thyroid medicine that is a cream that goes in her ear. Then I guess dirt and dust sticks to the cream. Just water didn’t really help, but this stuff really does. I tried just squirting it directly into her ear but it was not appreciated by her. So I’d recommend putting it in a cotton pad and wiping inside the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good for MOST Dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic ear cleaner but can prove irritating to some dogs with sensitive ears. Best to use after the bath while dog is still in the tub so when he shakes his head and you get coated with the slightly slimy product you can wipe both of you off. I recommend wiping the ears dry as gently as possible after the dog shakes it out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Good for mildly dirty ears only...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this to clean my cats’ ear but it hasn’t been doing much. I just purchased the one with the 1% hydrocortisone for their ear infection. Got this for the rave reviews but it didn’t work out as I had hoped. This one is only good for mildly dirty ears as I recall it working out for my puppies in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good and affordable for maintenance
customer_reviews.text: My dog had an ear infection and the vet had me use the Zymox with cortisone. Worked great. The vet said I could use that use that once a week as a preventative. I was running out, and explored options and found this. Also made by Zymox and a lot cheaper. Does a nice job cleaning the ears. No infections. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dioji

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived leaking. Upon examination, I noticed that I had been shipped a previously opened container filled with Who-knows-what?!? Authentic Zymox is factory sealed. This is both scary and scammy & Amazon should look into this!
customer_reviews.author: LML

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has chronic ear infection and I was taking him to the vet all the time for antibiotics and spending lots of money on special dog food as they said he may have food allergies etc. this works without the need for a vet visit Or special food. He has no ear infection and when he does get one this will heal his ears in a few days. You do have to be consistent and use as recommended. Highly recommend this product! Expensive but cheaper than multiple trips to the vet and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Kuyper

customer_reviews.title: Trusty
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates it but Zymox is just the best for cleansing. I’ve used other products when my cats have gotten injuries or ear infections and Zymox just works so well to take care of them. My only wish is that this product was thicker so that it didn’t go everywhere when my cat shakes his head after I squirt it in.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Well, this item was stolen ..... no witness but I can’t find anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: I believe this item was stolen. Didn’t receive. Amazon never answer my call and I reordered. I used this item before and works ok. My dog has ear infection and improved. Of course, I checked in with vet too.
customer_reviews.author: luckygirl

customer_reviews.title: Clean ears
customer_reviews.text: This product cleaned my cat's ears quite easily. I did not squirt it into her ears but did use Q-tips and tissues to clean her outer ears. It did make her fur and and ear "whiskers" greasy so I wet a paper towel and wiped the fur around her ears. Once the fur dried, it was soft as it was before. Her ears are nice and clean again.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great ear flush
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to ear flush my dog gets allergies and her ears fill up I use the medicine of this brand then I flush with this after the week of using the medicine and it works great. Saves me a vet visit. When all they're going to do is prescribe me this anyway. Thank you amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Stefany

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my 11 week old German Shepard. He had a lot of dirt and grime in his ears, and I just squirt this on a cottonball and gently clean his ears. I wouldn't squirt it in his ears because he is a puppy. but I haven't had to use it since he was 14 weeks and is now 20. so it works and keeps grime out and off! would recommend to any dog owner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to have done the trick
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't like anything foreign in and particularly ON her body. She's a Morkie. She'd just started scratching her ears. Someone suggested these drops on a Facebook dog lovers group. She didn't fight it. She acted like it tickled. They seemed to have some the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Earrings

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Cleans the dirt away easily with a cotton ball or qtips. My cat is usually fussy with putting drops in her ears but with this for whatever reason, she didn't move, i was amazed ...it must be soothing. .......I'll keep using it and see what happens.....
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff Pet care
customer_reviews.text: We repeatedly buy this since it works on our Labrador retrievers. It has a minimal yet pleasant odor that rapidly dissipates and our pal has no problems with it. EVen better it cleans very well and actually does help prevent future infections. We have not had a single ear infection since using this product line.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: One of the best ear cleaners on the market
customer_reviews.text: We use this on both our dogs, one if which is a Frenchie. Her big, upright ears trap so much stuff that it can easily create infections and she hates the feeling of this being squirted in her ear canal but she always feels better afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's Angel

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I use it once a week and it fends off the chronic ear infections we've been battling over here. It helps get out so much debris! I feel like I'm helping my dog feel better and I'm saving money from going to the vet. I'm so glad to know about this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Adriann

customer_reviews.title: BAD BAD BAD
customer_reviews.text: IT is really BAD! Just used it for the first time 8-15-2019. IT flared my dogs ears up really BAD! They looked like tomatoes! Sorry but I will never purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: sadiehawkins2

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by our holistic vet
customer_reviews.text: It is gentle, non toxic, easy to use. Our dog is a rescue and has allergies...we are working naturally to build up his immune system with the help of our vet. His ears get inflamed and irritated due to his allergies. This allows us to soothe and clean them as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for my Rotties and have always recommended it to other for their dogs. Easy to use, no need to wipe out after use, the enzymes go to work in helping to clean out the funk in ears! Will always reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cullen

customer_reviews.title: ... is the only stuff I will use after being recommended by a vet years ago for my own dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a dog groomer and this is the only stuff I will use after being recommended by a vet years ago for my own dogs ear mites. Does not leave a residue or sting their ears. You can either do a simple flush or squeeze some onto a cotton ball to really get those ears clean.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended it
customer_reviews.text: This makes the dog's ears all gummy after use so I don't really like it. I think it cleans out the ears okay just not user friendly. Just put a drop or two in and you should be fine (I don't seem to be able to do that & end up cleaning the exterior ears & combing gummy stuff out of her hair for days after).
customer_reviews.author: Laura Swaft

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs actually love having their ears cleaned with this (enough said!!). I use this on cotton rounds from Dollar Tree. I put a fair amount on the rounds and then gently clean the inner ear areas that can be reached.
customer_reviews.author: Noah's mom

customer_reviews.title: Good ear cleaner for my Springer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my Springer who was digging at his ears. Springers have floppy ears and can be a hassle to keep clean (but they are awesome). Anyway, used this against my Springer's will, and could tell that it helped loosen the gunk in his ears. Still had to wipe them clean. Turns out, he had a little infection which this product is not geared to treat, only to clean. I will use this to keep his ears clean and hopefully prevent another infection. My only gripe is that this product can leave the hair around the ears a little greasy.
customer_reviews.author: KWalker

customer_reviews.title: enzymatic ear cleaner for dogs
customer_reviews.text: My groomer recommended this for my labradoodles who keep getting ear infections so I am using it to see how it works. Should be much better than antibiotic drops all the time. Now if I could just convince the dogs to sit still!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Beeco

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The best stuff its saved me tones of money from not having to go to the vet for little ear infection and now i use it regularly and haven't had any issues at all. I just make sure i keep my pups ears dry and clean with this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: ReallY Great STuff
customer_reviews.text: Regular use of this product has minimized (and almost eliminated) my Labrador's constant ear infections. Where they used to be constant - now they are more once or twice a year and only because we probably forgot to clean them properly. This is really good stuff and i highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Clean and clear ears at last!
customer_reviews.text: My boxer was having a lot of trouble with yeast infections in his ears. Started cleaning them daily with Zymox, and yeast troubles no more! Now that his ears are healthy, I have reduced cleaning to a couple times a week. I would recommend doing the cleaning outside. My dog always shakes his head to rid himself of any excess, and I’m not a big fan of having a Zymoxed house.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara P.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works. Your dog will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: The best ear cleanser I've found. Not only does it clean the ears, but I'm having to clean as often as before. As for some reviewers that complained of messy stickiness afterwards, that's a good thing. That's just wax buildup and it means it's working. You just have to finish the job and clean it off. That only happened the first time or two of cleaning. And hasn't happened since.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!! It won't do much for actual serious infections or anything, but for the Normal dirty clogged with wax doggy ear it will work great! Just fill up the dogs ear canal, and then be sure to massage the base of the ear to really work it in and loosen up the wax. Try to not let your dog shake or tip their head right away either. After about ten minutes, if you look back at the ear, you will probably see a lot of wax loosened up and coming out ! It's easy now to wipe it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused ears to inflame
customer_reviews.text: I have used other Zymox products that I have loved. Unfortunately this stuff inflamed my dogs ears and now he has a hematoma :/ Back to epi-otic.
customer_reviews.author: ALM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Use frequently to keep ear infections at bay.
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard poodle, and I would likely be spending thousands in vet bill annually if not for this product. I already spent hundreds at the vet almost monthly to treat ear infections before I found this product. I use weekly or every other week (or if I forget, I use it when he starts itching his ears). It cleans out his ears and the itching stops immediately. Buy this lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Works well ...
customer_reviews.text: This really works well . Have a GSD that liked to get yeast infections in her ears. Use this periodically, it helps it and prevents it. Works well in clearing and cleaning the ear as well. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I have a cocker spaniel, that are known for ear issues. The veterinarian recommend this product for cleaning his ear. I usually purchase at the veterinarian. It cost alot less purchasing on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: BBLin

customer_reviews.title: The stuff is magical
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using Zymox on our four dogs for years and love it! We haven’t had to go to the vet for an ear infection in forever. Works like a charm every time!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Understood

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well
customer_reviews.text: This has a very thin consistency. I just squirted a bit into my dogs ear and soaked up the extra with a cotton ball. I do it once a month and I haven't had any problems with his ears since starting to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great for all pups
customer_reviews.text: I have a cocker spaniel and I'm particular on what I use to clean his ears and not take too much out that causes an infection. This works great and really does the job, I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Mallory King

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. One of our dogs is prone to ear infections so this really helps! First use I made a mess of things but once I used it a couple of times it’s easy.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bassett ears
customer_reviews.text: I have Bassett’s and they have problem ears. Since the rescue group told me about Zymox I am not seeing the vet for their ears all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Problem free with ear issues since using this product.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs require frequent baths due to their jobs as volunteer therapy dogs. They are English Toy Spaniels, and the hanging ears make them more susceptible to ear infections. My vet recommended using a cleaning solution after baths and beach days and sent me home with some of their RX blue solution. A friend recommended Zymox Ear Cleanser. We have been problem free with ears since using this product.
customer_reviews.author: DFitzTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I finished up a week's treatment of the Zymox Plus Otic-HC Enzymatic Ear Care Solution with this and it worked great (both products), but my dog is a stubborn one, and his weeping ears and smell is returning. This Cleanser and the Enzymatic Solution is loads better than the stalemated vet regimen and it will save me literally thousands of dollars. I'd rather keep the infection from getting worse and causing him discomfort than to pour thousands of dollars I don't have into antibiotics my dog keeps becoming immune to.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Used to clean beagle ears bi-weekly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Beagle floppy ears are prone to infection, so I use this cleaner every other week and my vet always raves about how great and clean their ears look.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Leffler

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for our poodle unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to make my dogs ears dirtier and more prone to infection. Not sure if I got a bad batch or what... I just stick to the vet prescribed medicine now and be sure to manually pluck and clean our dogs ears weekly. She hasn't had many ear issues with the extra maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: AN Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Have a Springer Spaniel and we have to constantly clean his ears. If we let it go to long they get infected. Friend recommended this and I bought several bottles. After about a week of use the ears are fairly clear. The only thing that appears to be a problem, and I'm not sure it is from the ear cleanser or another source, is that the hair on the inside and around the ear is very moist and oily now, and matted - but ears appear to be better, only the vet will tell me for sure.
customer_reviews.author: JasonH

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my cats ear up in 1 week flushing it ...
customer_reviews.text: Cleared my cats ear up in 1 week flushing it every other day. She has had chronic wax buildup and infections on and off for years and this has all but resolved it!
customer_reviews.author: NMJ12345

customer_reviews.title: Works every time.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has issues with her ears every year around the same time. This is the only thing that consistently helps.
customer_reviews.author: TrishaAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great wsy to keep the ears healthy
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep the ear infections away. We use it for every dog in our family. Cheaper to buy the gallon and refill the small bottles for everyone. Dogs are happier without the ear problems. 1 Dalmatian, 2 Goldendiidles, 1 Lhasa apso
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work out for us.
customer_reviews.text: Dog was shaking head a lot after treatment with this and solution. Didnt work out for us. Didnt see much improvement. Took dog to vet instead to reduce uncomfortableness faster.
customer_reviews.author: Londell Boyd Sr

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product the smell is ungodly my cat stinks like urine and my other cat is afraid to go near him and now causing messes all over my house ruining my carpet. I've repeatedly tried washing his ear out and the hair around his ear and he still smells . I dont recommend using it what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great For Clearing Up Sadie's Ear Itch
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs sometimes gets some sort of ear itch that causes her a lot of discomfort. She shakes her head often and hard. You can tell it's really bothering her. When that happens I use some of this ear cleanser and it clears the problem right up. She hates it but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue E

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: One of our dog's ears was red and he was scratching it a lot. One application and it was better. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: My dog didnt mind me putting this in his ear
customer_reviews.text: My dog didnt mind me putting this in his ear. He stopped shaking his head and scratching his ears.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Willis

customer_reviews.title: german shepherd chronic ear yeast
customer_reviews.text: i have found there products help keep my german shepherds ear yeast issues at bay.I clean twice a week with this product and if some how i get so busy with work i forget he develops a little he will shake his head his ears after cleaning mostly stay a clear white light pink much better than what i was doing there ear drops are a god send he developed a ear hematoma and i used there ear products and it disappeared in 2 weeks on its own no scarring left over so happy i found zymox ear products have saved my dog from suffering
customer_reviews.author: gummybear

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Our floppy-eared mutt constantly gets build up as well as mites in his ears. We were taking him to the vet at least once a year to get his ears looked at and getting meds for them. The build up happens mostly in one year. We have avoided the expensive vet bill by cleaning out his ears with this as soon as we notice any build up in his ears or him scratching. This stuff works great and doesn't seem to bother him at all. I would recommend this to anybody that has had issues with their pup's ears!

After bath, I always use this keeps his ears clean, preventing infections.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaning solution for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I got this ear cleanser for my lab mix after using the one that my vet gave me. The one from my vet ended up irritating my dog's ears making the inside of her ear red. That's when I decided to try something else. I have been using the Zymox solution for a couple of months and it has worked great and without irritation so far. The squeeze bottle makes it easy to apply the solution into her ears. It's also very reasonably priced. I will definitely get more when I run out.

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for all dog owners for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for all dog owners for each bath time. It helps prevent any infection and helps get any excess water out after a bath or swimming. Gets the stink out!! Use of this regularly will prevent expensive trips to the vet, I tried using one less "medicated", and I switched back. This really prevents any problems.

customer_reviews.title: While I do think both the Zymox cleaner and treatment are excellent products, make sure you order the one you ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sent wrong product, sent Zymox Otic which is a treatment, not a cleaner. (It specifically states on the label of the bottle received that you are NOT to clean the ears befor treatment). While I do think both the Zymox cleaner and treatment are excellent products, make sure you order the one you want, as Amazon doesn't seem to know the difference.
customer_reviews.author: TRS

product_meta.title: ZYMOX Ear Cleanser Solution for Dogs and Cats
feature_bullets: Cat and dog ear cleaner – quickly and effectively clean non-infected ears in pets of all ages
Gentle, non-toxic and non-irritating solution free from harsh detergents, veterinarian recommended
Patented antimicrobial LP3 Enzyme System helps to gently maintain healthy, fresh smelling ears
Cat and dog ear cleaner solution to manage dirty ears, safe for flushing the ears after an infection
Proudly USA made in a Federally Regulated Manufacturing Facility, cruelty-free and easy to use
